lead_paragraph: Russian whistleblower Yulia Stepanova was cleared by the IAAF on Friday to compete as a neutral athlete in the European championships and the Rio de Janeiro Olympics.

headline.print_headline: Russian Whistleblower Cleared to Compete as Neutral at Euros
headline.main: Russian Whistleblower Cleared to Compete as Neutral at Euros
